Reviews.Title: “Dimitris - April 2012”

Reviews.Content: hotels location opposite tram station mentioned web site 500 meters easy street names people hotel 4 star 3 towels holes windows dont close view awful curtains 20 staff speaking english wifi patience elevators stop whenever breakfast coffee tasteless juice tourists omelette watery tables clean price ok facilities wouldnt suggest
